## contrast

### 40x20

**standard:**
```
========================================
================++=++===+===============
====+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++=======
=====+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++==
=========++++++++++++++++++++++++++++===
+++++++++++++++++++++++++-:::-==========
=====+++++++++=++++++++-:.::-++++=======
=========+++++++++++++++=:=++++++++=====
-========++++++********++-=++++++=======
=========+++++++++++=====:.=====--------
=========================::=============
==========+++++++++++++++:=+++++++++++++
---======================:-=============
```

**blocks:**
```
▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒░░░
▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒
▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒
▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒
▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒
▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒░░░░░▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒
▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒░░  ░░▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒
░░░░░▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒ ░▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒
░░░░░▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒░░▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒
▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒▒░ ░░░░░░░░░░░░░

### 80x24

**standard:**
```
========================================================================
========================================================================
========================================================================
=================+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++==================
======++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++==============
=====++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++=======
===========+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++==
=================+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++====
=============++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++=====
++++====++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++==========================
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++=  ......==================
=======++++++++++++++++++===+++++++++++++-:... :=---=++++++=============
==========+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++===-- .:::-=++++++=============
==============++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++-: -+++++++++++++++=========
------=============+++++++++++************++++ =+++++++++++++++++=======
----===============++++++******************+++ =+++++++++++++++=========
========++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ :========================
===============+++++++++++++++++++++==========  -=======----------------
==============================================  -========-----==========
---=========================================== .-=======================
===================++++================+++++++ -=+++++++++++++++++++++++
====-==============+++++++++++++++++++++++++++ -++++++++++++++++++++++++
==================+++++++++++++++++++++++++++= -=++++++++===============
-------------------=========================== -=================-------
```

**blocks:**
```
